relevant_findings.general: Laying in bed, comfortable appearing, no acute distress.
relevant_findings.HEENT: Atraumatic, sclera anicteric, dry mucous membranes, oropharynx clear.
relevant_findings.cardiac: RRR, S1/S2, no murmurs, gallops, or rubs.
relevant_findings.lung: Clear to auscultation bilaterally. No crackles, wheezes, or rhonchi.
relevant_findings.abdomen: Normoactive bowel sounds. Soft, nondistended. Minimally tender to palpation in epigastric region without rebound or guarding.
relevant_findings.extremities: Warm and well perfused. Pulses 2+. No peripheral edema.

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Patient reports feeling slightly improved. Denies fevers but reports chills.
Initial tachycardia noted at the time of admission, later stabilized.
